Source code for utils.masking

import torch



[docs]class TriangularCausalMask:
    def __init__(self, B, L, device="cpu"):
        mask_shape = [B, 1, L, L]
        with torch.no_grad():
            self._mask = torch.triu(
                torch.ones(mask_shape, dtype=torch.bool), diagonal=1
            ).to(device)

    @property
    def mask(self):
        return self._mask




[docs]class ProbMask:
    def __init__(self, B, H, L, index, scores, device="cpu"):
        _mask = torch.ones(L,
                           scores.shape[-1],
                           dtype=torch.bool).to(device).triu(1)
        _mask_ex = _mask[None, None, :].expand(B, H, L, scores.shape[-1])
        indicator = _mask_ex[torch.arange(B)[:, None, None], torch.arange(H)[
            None, :, None], index, :].to(device)
        self._mask = indicator.view(scores.shape).to(device)

    @property
    def mask(self):
        return self._mask
